bibl.title: Roman Sites in the Northwest Delta.
The Intellectual Heritage of Egypt. Studies Presented to László Kákosy by Friends and Colleagues on the Occasion of His 60th Birthday
bibl.author: SPENCER, A.J.

bibl.note: Sites visited in the winter of 1989-90, as part of a programme of examination of different Delta tells for possible excavation.
SPENCER A.J., Roman Sites in the Northwest Delta.

Ulrich LUFT (Ed.), The Intellectual Heritage of Egypt. Studies Presented to László Kákosy by Friends and Colleagues on the Occasion of His 60th Birthday = Studia Aegyptiaca. 14 (Budapest, 1992) pp. 535-539, 1 carte.
